mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id, c.content, c.created_at, c.diary_id, d.snapshot_team_code AS diaryTeamCode, d.one_line_comment AS diaryTitle FROM comments c JOIN diaries d ON c.diary_id = d.diary_id WHERE c.member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY c.created_at DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE c FROM comments c INNER JOIN diaries d ON c.diary_id = d.diary_id WHERE c.comment_id = #{commentId} AND (c.member_id = #{requestMemberId} OR d.member_id = #{requestMemberId})
